About Us

We are an open source project and could use your help. Support us onGithuband if you want your stream/college made available, reach ushere.

Disclaimer

×
Features
  • Now download your reports and view them offline! Reports available for individual semester as well as all of them combined
  • Overall section - Summary and average of all your available results
  • Class Ranks - See where you stand in your college
  • University Ranks - Compare yourself to students of the entire University in your stream
  • Compare your result with your classmates by clicking the '+' in class list
×
How to help?
Help us by giving suggestions and feedback and if you like what we do, leave us a star on Github :)

If you are interested in web development, fork our code and make your updates to it. Raise an issue here if you have any problems in understanding the code.
